rooms.description: A spacious Mediterranean living area with warm colors and tiled flooring.
An adjoining dining space that flows into the kitchen for a seamless look.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with open shelving and integrated island seating.
The primary bedroom featuring a private balcony and en-suite bathroom oriented for optimal Vastu alignment (north-east).
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light from the south-west.
Additional bedroom designed for flexibility and a quiet environment.
A dedicated library space with built-in shelves, reading lamps, and ample natural light from the north-eastern side.
Multi-purpose room serving as a guest bedroom or study area.
Common bathroom for bedrooms with Vastu considerations ensuring proper ventilation and lighting.

openings.features: Wide entrance door flanked by Mediterranean-style columns, inviting visitors into the house.
Private balcony opening that provides a serene view of the garden.
Large French doors connecting the living room with the expansive garden, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
High windows on the northern facade for optimal sunlight as per Vastu principles.
